title: Approaching poetry in English literature
creator_credit: David Zweck, Daryl Wayland and Television Production Unit, Box Hill College of TAFE
brief_description: Dr Ray Misson of Melbourne College of Advanced Education seeks to demystify poetry by providing a guide for students to help their approach to this area of literature. In a practical commonsense manner, he uses poems by Donne, Browning, Marvell and Coleridge as examples.
